column3: Single women have a dreadful propensity for being poor. Which is one very strong argument in favor of matrimony.
Friends are generally of the same sex, for when men and women agree, it is only in the conclusions; their reasons are always different.
Women have always been courageous... They are always fearless when protecting their children and in the last century they have been fearless in the fight for their rights.
Women are frightening. If you get to 41 as a man, you're quite battle-scarred.
The most virtuous women have something within them, something that is never chaste.
Women should try to increase their size rather than decrease it, because I believe the bigger we are, the more space we'll take up, and the more we'll have to be reckoned with.
Women get more unhappy the more they try to liberate themselves.
Men are allowed to have passion and commitment for their work... a woman is allowed that feeling for a man, but not her work.
Why is it men are permitted to be obsessed about their work, but women are only permitted to be obsessed about men?
I believe women still face a glass ceiling that must be shattered.
I grew up in the Bronx where you would stay up late with your girlfriends, just being silly in our bedrooms, whatever. And I was always the clown.
All women's issues are to some degree men's issues and all men's issues are to some degree women's issues because when either sex wins unilaterally both sexes lose.
You see a lot of smart guys with dumb women, but you hardly ever see a smart woman with a dumb guy.
Men and women, women and men. It will never work.
Women, you can have it all - a loving man, devoted husband, loving children, a fabulous career.

I think women get caught up too much in having a plan - 'I'm going to get married at this age; I'm going to have a kid at this age' - and then they just try to find a guy who will fit into that picture. I don't want my life to be based on that.

The term 'alpha female' originated in my field of animal behavior, but has acquired new meaning. It refers to women who are in charge, for example, by flirting and dating on their own terms. It is also used maliciously for a loud-mouthed, controlling woman who has no patience with deviating opinions.
The No. 1 impediment to women succeeding in the workforce is now in the home.
Women don't take enough risks. Men are just 'foot on the gas pedal.' We're not going to close the achievement gap until we close the ambition gap.
Women wish to be loved without a why or a wherefore; not because they are pretty, or good, or well-bred, or graceful, or intelligent, but because they are themselves.
I think that maybe if women and children were in charge we would get somewhere.
Women are the real architects of society.
It is easier for women to succeed in business, the arts, and politics in America than in Europe.
Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
I think today women are very scared to celebrate themselves, because then they just get labeled.
The sight of women talking together has always made men uneasy; nowadays it means rank subversion.
